feature_defs.trigger: when you cast a spell with a spell slot that restores hit points
effects: The creature regains additional hit points equal to 2 + the spell slots level.
You always have the spells in the Life Domain Spells table prepared at the cleric levels shown.
You expend one use of Channel Divinity to restore a total of hit points equal to five times your cleric level.
Choose bloodied creatures within 30 feet (including you) and divide the healing among them.
limits: This feature can restore a creature to no more than half its hit point maximum.

feature_defs.trigger: immediately after you cast a spell with a spell slot that restores hit points to one or more creatures other than yourself
effects: You regain hit points equal to 2 + the spell slots level.
When you roll dice to determine the number of hit points you restore with a spell, you use the highest number possible for each die.
